settings.title: Exceptional office furniture, half the price
settings.text: Branch sells premium office furniture direct to save you time and money. Shipping, installation and flexibility included.

settings.title: Furniture For The New World of Work
settings.text: We founded Branch to make it easy and affordable to furnish an office that inspires your team and adapts to your needs. From ordering and assembly to space design and flexible trade-in, we take care of furniture so you can sit down (or stand) and get to work.

settings.title: Every team deserves office furniture that helps you work healthy and adapts to your needs.

settings.description:
Branch sets a new standard in value for office furnishing. We use Branch for our office and recommend them to clients that want quality without cost and hassle.

Jonathan Wasserstrum
CEO of Squarefoot

Branch was a dream partner in our furnishing process. The experience was seamless, and they accommodated a tight deadline for opening our new location.

Jenny Hahn
Director of Real Estate, Breather

We looked at a handful of furniture solutions and found Branch to be the best and easiest option. Our new office manager loved the all-in delivery and assembly!

Jeff Cripe
CEO of Cargo

settings.title: Teams of all sizes trust Branch
Enjoy Premium Materials And Design
settings.text: Durable and ergonomic, the Branch collection of contract-grade essentials is backed by a ten year warranty.

settings.title: Build Your Business, Not Furniture
settings.text: Branch handles it all from concept to furnished: space design, delivery and installation for enterprise orders.

settings.title: Adapt As You Grow
settings.text: Update your space plan, add new furniture, or trade in used furniture in a click as your team grows.

settings.title: Save Time And Money
settings.text: Buying direct saves you time and money without sacrificing quality. No markups or hidden fees.

settings.title: The Branch Difference
settings.subtitle: Build a beautiful office without breaking the bank. Buy furniture with Branch and:

settings.title:
Premium

Ergonomics
settings.popup_text:
Our furniture is made to support your workday: ergonomically designed to support your health and productivity, with durable construction built to last a decade in high-traffic corporate environments.

We manufacture in the same factories as premium contract furniture competitors, but sell direct to save you time and money. Learn more by reading our story.

settings.title:
Easy

Assembly
settings.popup_text:
Short on time? No problem -- all Branch furniture ships assembled or ready to assemble in fifteen to thirty minutes so you can get to work. Get live assembly help on our chat anytime from 9am-6pm ET (go ahead, give it a try and say hi!).

Furnishing a corporate office or want to kick back and relax? Enjoy white glove installation within our service areas; we'll take care of everything, from coordinating with your building to space planning and assembly. Full details here.

settings.title:
Branch 
Warranty
settings.popup_text: All Branch products are backed by an industry-leading warranty. Find our complete warranty policy and exclusions here.

settings.title:
Branch 
Flex
settings.popup_text:
Moving to a new office? Need to turn a conference room into a pod of desks? As you grow and needs change, trade in eligible Branch furniture for credit toward your next purchase. Better for you—and the environment.

Excludes Quad and Six Person benching products. Available for enterprise clients only. See how it works.

settings.title:
Need 
help?
settings.popup_text: Click here to contact us, or chat with a specialist. See our frequently asked questions.

settings.title: Meet Branch
settings.text: Branch makes it easy and affordable to create an office you love. We sell direct, so we cost half as much as premium furniture of comparable quality. And we provide end-to-end service: space planning, delivery, white glove installation and the ability to trade in used furniture when you move or grow.

settings.title: Furnish With Branch
settings.text: Branch takes care of office furniture so you can build your business. With white glove installation, space planning and flexibility included—and wholesale prices that save you money on premium products—we’re the modern way for growing teams to furnish office space.

settings.title: Meet Branch
settings.text: Branch makes it easy and affordable to create an office you love. We sell direct, so we cost as much as premium furniture of comparable quality. And we provide end-to-end service: space planning, delivery, white glove installation and the ability to trade in used furniture when you move or grow.

settings.description: Brushed, double flip grommet for easy cable management. In-desk power available
Optional privacy panels add visual and auditory privacy for the open office
Adjustable feet stand stable on every surface, hold 650 pounds per desktop

settings.title: Plan Your Space
settings.text: Answer a few questions to help us imagine your dream office, and we'll send you a free space plan and ideas from a Branch Expert.

settings.title: How it Works
settings.text1: Share your floor plan and answer a few questions. How big is your team? What's your work style?
settings.text2: We'll send you a free space plan with ideas from a Branch Expert. Keep the plan even if you don't buy from us.
settings.text3: When you buy furniture from Branch, request free updates to your space plan online as your team grows.

settings.text1: All we need is a floor plan—your building manager or landlord should have this—and a sense of your values and needs. Fill out our quick survey, and we'll respond within three business days with a free rendering that matches your vision.
settings.text2: After we share your space plan, a Branch Expert will follow up with ideas for how to make the most of your space. Branch Experts are industry veterans with years of experience designing productive and happy office spaces.
settings.text3: When you buy Branch furniture, request and receive an updated space plan online, any time, as your company grows and needs change.

settings.title: Create Your Plan
settings.text: Ready for free ideas on how to arrange your office?

settings.title: Office furniture for the 21st century.
settings.text: From delivery and assembly to space planning and flexibility, we take care of furniture so you can sit (or stand) and get to work.

settings.title: In 2018, our CEO Greg Hayes discovered a problem—buying office furniture sucks.
settings.text2:
After furnishing dozens of offices for a commercial real estate startup, Greg realized the average office furniture company falls into one of two categories: high quality, but expensive and slow, or affordable and fast but lacking in quality and service. There wasn’t a great option for individuals and teams who wanted to furnish an inspiring office without taking forever or breaking the bank.

When it comes to high end office furniture, the issue is middlemen. Buying from furniture dealers means navigating dozens of options, unclear pricing, and markups up to 50%. As your team grows, your space plan and furniture don't adapt: your furniture, your problem.

That’s why we founded Branch: to make it easy for people and teams of all sizes to create an office you love. We sell direct, so our collection costs half as much as premium furniture of comparable quality. If you're a team, we provide end-to-end service: space design, delivery, white glove installation, even the ability to trade in used furniture when you move or grow.

settings.title: Office Furniture That Works
settings.text: Scroll to see how Branch makes office furniture easy for growing teams.
settings.text1: Hundreds of confusing options | No price transparency
settings.text4: Manage multiple vendors | Handle building requirements
settings.b_text1: Curated line of essentials | Space planning included | Buy direct, save ~50%
settings.b_text2: Concept to installation in 5-15 days | Delivery and assembly included | Branch Captain coordinates it all
settings.b_text3: 10 year warranty | Trade in used furniture | Inventory management in a click

settings.title: Our Furniture
settings.text: Branch furniture is modern, durable and backed by the industry-leading Branch Warranty. From desks and ergonomic chairs to conference tables, lounge furniture and accessories, we sell one product in every category and it's built to outlast your lease.

settings.title: Our Prices
settings.text: Cutting out middlemen, maintaining a lean line of modular inventory and adding flexibility helps Branch save you up to 50% compared to premium office furniture of comparable quality. Space planning, installation and trade-in included for enterprise clients.

settings.title: Our Flexibility
settings.text: Modern businesses change fast, and Branch is on your side during and after your purchase. Once you buy from Branch, use our website to create new space plans, get support, and trade in old furniture for credit toward your next purchase. Better for you—and the environment.

settings.title: Backed By The Best
settings.text: We’re backed by leading real estate and technology investors to build the best experience in office furniture.

settings.heading: Before You Buy
settings.faq_content_1: Need extra lumbar? What does tilt tension do anyway? Take our quiz or talk to an expert on chat to get personalized guidance on the right Branch products for you.
settings.faq_content_2: We offer a full line of chairs, desks and accessories to match your stature and perfect your posture.
settings.faq_content_3: Our task seating line uses up to 60% post-consumer recycled material, and is up to 90% recyclable after use. Good for you—and the planet.
settings.faq_content_4: Once you purchase your new office furniture online, we'll ship it for free. Worried about the fit? We've got your back—schedule a free ergonomic consultation with our team, or return in original packaging within 30 days of purchase.
settings.faq_content_5: Furnishing an office for a team of ten or more? We'll take care of everything, from designing your space to delivery and white glove installation. Chat with our sales team to learn more.
